gobblin.writer

Class TrackerBasedWatermarkManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.writer.TrackerBasedWatermarkManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WatermarkManager, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class TrackerBasedWatermarkManager
extends Object
implements WatermarkManager
    Responsible for managing continuous commit of watermarks. Uses a FineGrainedWatermarkTracker to keep track of watermarks. Periodically fetches watermarks from the tracker and commits them to WatermarkStorage. TODO: Add metrics monitoring

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface gobblin.writer.WatermarkManager
